description: Invokes the AWS Lambda function associated with the SIP media application and transaction ID in an update request. The Lambda function can then return a new set of actions.

parameters.name: SipMediaApplicationId
parameters.description: The ID of the SIP media application handling the call.

parameters.name: TransactionId
parameters.description: The ID of the call transaction.

parameters.name: Arguments
parameters.description: Arguments made available to the Lambda function as part of the CALL_UPDATE_REQUESTED event. Can contain 0-20 key-value pairs. (string) --- (string) ---

nested_items.name: SipMediaApplicationCall
nested_items.description: A Call instance for a SIP media application.
